title: The provisions for minimum marginal distances as given in Table No
clause_text: The provisions for minimum marginal distances as given in Table No.6-D below shall apply for the Residential buildings, Residential with mixed uses permissible in Residential Zone and Residential buildings permissible in other zones. The width of the road in above table shall govern the requirements in column 3 to 8.
